@bullzeye95 wrote:

Ok I’ll try to fix that later. I have guitar practice now.

EDIT: Oh, I forgot to tell you, I made it so you can set the ammount of loads you want it to mine and stop

EDIT2: You don’t have to have the mining include in there. Srl/srl.scar includes it. Take it out and see if that works for some reason.

item.title: Help my 1st script (powerminer plz)
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]program New;
procedure FFight; forward;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Mining.Scar}

const LoadsToDo = 5; //How many loads do you want it to do?
const rockwait = 2000; //How many miliseconds do you want it to wait before clicking another rock?
const rockcolor = 9859920; //The color of the rock.

var
loads:integer;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
loads := loads + 1;
end;

procedure FFight;
begin if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(1000);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 13+random(7);
DropTo(2, 14);
DropTo(15, 28);

end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(’ …’);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(loads) + ’ loads.’);
WriteLn(’ …’);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSrlMining;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
until(loads=loadstodo)
end.[/scar]
You forgot to put end after the progress report procedrue

Read full topic

item.title: Help my 1st script (powerminer plz)
item.dc:creator: @Rencuz Rencuz
item.description:
@Rencuz wrote:

okay can anyone help me thats script dont :(compile and ic ant test it and say if smthng wrong and can u guy fix it pls

[code]program New;
procedure FFight; forward;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/Mining.Scar}

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

var
loads:integer;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336)
mmouse(x,y,3,3)
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
loads := loads + 1;
end;

procedure FFight;
begin if (FindFight) then
begin
Writeln(‘Found Fight’);
RunAwayDirection(‘N’);
Wait(8000 + random(3000));
RunBack;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
OpenBox;
SolveBox;
wait(1000);
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
GambleNewBox;
end;
if (FindNewBox) then
begin
LogOut;
Writeln(‘Unable To Solve Box…Terminating’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
MouseSpeed:= 13+random(7);
DropTo(2, 14);
DropTo(15, 28);

end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
WriteLn(’ …’);
WriteLn(‘Mined and Dropped ’ + inttostr(loads) + ’ loads.’);
WriteLn(’ …’);

begin
SetupSRL;
SetupSrlMining;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
until(false)
end.

[/code]
